Package org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl

Class SyncAuditEventBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.audit.events.AuditEventBuilder<T>
org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.SyncAuditEventBuilder
public class SyncAuditEventBuilder extends org.forgerock.audit.events.AuditEventBuilder<T>
This is the audit event builder for SYNC event.
